$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/readme
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.text: * GitHub Share Button * compatiable font-awesome plugin !! TODO * add macro to embed single tid, not copy tid

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/macro/github-cat
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.text: \define github-cat() \define base-repo() https://github.com/ \define tid() $:/config/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/config <$button tooltip="GitHub repo" class="o-btn-back"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-external-window" $param={{{ [get[text]addprefix]}}}/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/icon-blue}} \end \define oribbon() \define base-repo() https://github.com/ \define tid() $:/config/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/config get[text]addprefix] }}} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="githubCorner" aria-label="View source on GitHub" > {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/icon/corner}} \end

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/config
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.text:
\whitespace trim \define tid() $:/config/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/config
Github Repo Link: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="text" tag="input" placeholder="username/repo" default="oeyoews/neotw" />

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/style.css
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/embed-emptystory
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.text: \whitespace trim \define base-repo() https://github.com/ \define tid() $:/config/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/config <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]count[]match[0]]"> get[text]addprefix] }}} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="githubCorner" aria-label="View source on GitHub" > {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/icon/corner}}

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/ui/embed-ribbon
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.text: \whitespace trim \define base-repo() https://github.com/ \define tid() $:/config/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/config <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}match[https:]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/state/notebook-sidebar]is[missing]] [[$:/state/notebook-sidebar]get[text]match[no]]"> get[text]addprefix] }}} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="githubCorner" aria-label="View source on GitHub" > {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/icon/corner}}

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/ui/pagetemplate
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.text:
\define base-repo() https://github.com/ \define tip() GitHub Repo \define tid() $:/config/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/config <$list filter="[[$:/StoryList]get[list]count[]match[0]]"> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}match[https:]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/state/notebook-sidebar]get[text]else[no]match[no]]">
get[text]addprefix] }}} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="githubCorner" aria-label="View source on GitHub" > {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/icon/corner}}

$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/ui/ribbon
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.caption: GitHub share button
$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-sha.text: \whitespace trim \define base-repo() https://github.com/ \define tip() GitHub Repo \define tid() $:/config/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/config <$button tooltip=<> aria-label=<> class=<>> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-external-window" $param={{{ [get[text]addprefix]}}}/> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-github-share/icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text=<>/>
